You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level. Each option also improves when you become an 18th-level fighter.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Shot
entries: The Arcane Shot feature lets you choose options for it at certain levels. The options are presented here in alphabetical order. They are all magical effects, and each one is associated with one of the schools of magic.
If an option requires a saving throw, your Arcane Shot save DC equals 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Archer's Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you learn magical theory or some of the secrets of nature—typical for practitioners of this elven martial tradition. You gain proficiency in either the {@skill Arcana} or {@skill Nature}.

subclassFeature.name: Magic Arrow
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic. Whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it a magic arrow, with a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls. The magic fades from the arrow immediately after it hits or misses its target.

subclassFeature.name: Curving Shot
entries: A nivell 7, you learn how to direct an errant arrow toward a new target. When you make an attack roll with a magic arrow and miss, pots, com a acció bonus, to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Arcane Shot
entries: A nivell 7, you learn an additional Arcane Shot option.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Arcane Shot
entries: A nivell 10, you learn an additional Arcane Shot option.

subclassFeature.name: Ever-Ready Shot
entries: Començant a nivell 15, your magical archery is ever available to you when you need it most. If you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Arcane Shot
entries: A nivell 15, you learn an additional Arcane Shot option.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Arcane Shot
entries: A nivell 18, you learn an additional Arcane Shot option.

subclassFeature.name: Brute
entries: Brutes are simple warriors who rely on mighty attacks and their own durability to overcome their enemies. Some brutes combine this physical might with tactical cunning. Others just hit things until those things stop hitting back.

subclassFeature.name: Brute Force
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you're able to strike with your weapons with especially brutal force. Whenever you hit with a weapon that you're proficient with and deal damage, the weapon's damage increases by an amount based on your level en aquesta classe, as shown on the Brute Bonus Damage table.

entries.caption: Brute Bonus Damage
rows: {@dice 1d4}
{@dice 1d6}
{@dice 1d8}
{@dice 1d10}

subclassFeature.name: Brutish Durability
entries: Començant a nivell 7, your toughness allows you to shrug off assaults that would devastate others.

Whenever you make a saving throw, roll {@dice 1d6} and add the die to your saving throw total. If applying this bonus to a salvada de mort increases the total to 20 or higher, you gain the benefits of rolling a 20 on the {@dice d20}.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Estil de Lluita
entries: A nivell 10, you can choose a second option from the Estil de Lluita feature.

subclassFeature.name: Devastating Critical
entries: Començant a nivell 15, when you score a critical hit with a weapon attack, you gain a bonus to that weapon's damage roll equal to your level en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Survivor
entries: A nivell 18, you attain the pinnacle of resilience in battle. At the start of each of your turns in combat, you regain punts de vida equal to 5 + el teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1 punt de vida). You don't gain this benefit if you have 0 punts de vida or if you have more than half of your punts de vida left.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Archer
entries: An Arcane Archer studies a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects. Arcane Archers are some of the most elite warriors among the elves. They stand watch over the fringes of elven domains, keeping a keen eye out for trespassers and using magic-infused arrows to defeat monsters and invaders before they can reach elven settlements. Over the centuries, the methods of these elf archers have been learned by members of other races who can also balance arcane aptitude with archery.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Archer Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you learn magical theory or some of the secrets of nature—typical for practitioners of this elven martial tradition. You choose to gain proficiency in either the {@skill Arcana} or the {@skill Nature}, and you choose to learn either the {@spell prestidigitation} or the {@spell druidcraft} cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Shot
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to unleash special magical effects with some of your shots. When you gain this feature, you learn two Arcane Shot options (escull) (see "Arcane Shot Options" below).

Un cop per torn when you fire an arrow from a shortbow or longbow com a part de l'acció {@action Attack}, you can apply one of your Arcane Shot options to that arrow. You decide to use the option when the arrow hits a creature, unless the option doesn't involve an attack roll. You have two uses of this ability, i en recuperes tots els usos of it quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level. Each option also improves when you become an 18th-level fighter.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Shot Options
entries: The Arcane Shot feature lets you choose options for it at certain levels. The options are presented here in alphabetical order. They are all magical effects, and each one is associated with one of the schools of magic.
If an option requires a saving throw, your Arcane Shot save DC is calculated as follows:

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) quan arribes a nivell 7.

subclassFeature.name: Curving Shot
entries: A nivell 7, you learn how to direct an errant arrow toward a new target. When you make an attack roll with a magic arrow and miss, pots, com a acció bonus, to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

subclassFeature.name: Magic Arrow
entries: A nivell 7, you gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic. Whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. The magic fades from the arrow immediately after it hits or misses its target.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) quan arribes a nivell 10.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) quan arribes a nivell 15.

subclassFeature.name: Ever-Ready Shot
entries: Començant a nivell 15, your magical archery is available whenever battle starts. If you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option (escull) quan arribes a nivell 18. Each option also improves when you become an 18th-level fighter.

subclassFeature.name: Cavalier
entries: The archetypal Cavalier excels at mounted combat. Usually born among the nobility and raised at court, a Cavalier is equally at home leading a cavalry charge or exchanging repartee at a state dinner. Cavaliers also learn how to guard those in their charge from harm, often serving as the protectors of their superiors and of the weak. Compelled to right wrongs or earn prestige, many of these fighters leave their lives of comfort to embark on glorious adventure.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. Alternatively, you learn one language (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Born to the Saddle
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your mastery as a rider becomes apparent. Tens avantatge a saving throws made to avoid falling off your mount. If you fall off your mount and descend no more than 10 feet, you can land on your feet if you're not {@condition incapacitated}.
Finally, mounting or dismounting a creature costs you only 5 feet of movement, rather than half your speed.

subclassFeature.name: Unwavering Mark
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you can menace your foes, foiling their attacks and punishing them for harming others. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat cos a cos, you can mark the creature fins el final del teu proper torn. L'efecte acaba prematurament if you are {@condition incapacitated} or you die, or if someone else marks the creature.
While it is a 5 peus de tu, a creature marked by you impacta amb desavantatge that doesn't target you.

A més, si una criatura marked by you deals damage to anyone other than you, you can make a special atac armat cos a cos against the marked creature com a acció bonus en el teu proper torn. Tens avantatge a the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals extra damage to the target equal to half el teu nivell de guerrer.

Regardless of the number of creatures you mark, you can make this special attack a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Força (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos of it quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Warding Maneuver
entries: A nivell 7, you learn to fend off strikes directed at you, your mount, or other creatures nearby. If you or a creature que puguis veure a 5 peus de tu is hit by an attack, you can roll {@dice 1d8} com a reacció if you're wielding a melee weapon or a shield. Roll the die, and add the number rolled to the target's AC against that attack. If the attack still hits, the target has resistance against the attack's damage.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos of it quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Hold the Line
entries: A nivell 10, you become a master of locking down your enemies. Creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you when they move 5 feet or more while within your reach, and if you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 fins el final del torn actual.

subclassFeature.name: Ferocious Charger
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you can run down your foes, whether you're mounted or not. If you move at least 10 feet en línia recta right before attacking a creature and you hit it with the attack, that target ha de salvar per Força. (CD 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador de Força). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. Només pots emprar aquest tret un cop a cada torn teu.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Defender
entries: Començant a nivell 18, you respond to danger with extraordinary vigilance. In combat, you get a special reaction that you can take once on every creature's turn, except your turn. You can use this special reaction only to make an opportunity attack, and you can't use it durant el mateix torn that you take your normal reaction.

subclassFeature.name: Samurai
entries: The Samurai is a fighter who draws on an implacable fighting spirit to overcome enemies. A Samurai's resolve is nearly unbreakable, and the enemies in a Samurai's path have two choices: yield or die fighting.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills (escull): {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. Alternatively, you learn one language (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Fighting Spirit
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your intensity in battle can shield you and help you strike true. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can give yourself advantage on weapon attack rolls fins el final del torn actual. When you do so, you also gain 5 punts de vida temporals. The number of punts de vida temporals increases Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, increasing to 10 a nivell 10 and 15 a nivell 15.
Pots emprar aquest tret 3 cops, i en recuperes tots els usos of it quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Elegant Courtier
entries: Començant a nivell 7, your discipline and attention to detail allow you to excel in social situations. Whenever you make a Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}), you gain a bonus to the check equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa.
Your self-control also causes you to gain proficiency in Saviesa saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intel·ligència or Carisma saving throws (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Tireless Spirit
entries: Començant a nivell 10, when you roll initiative and have no uses of Fighting Spirit remaining, you regain one use.

subclassFeature.name: Rapid Strike
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Attack} en el teu torn and have advantage on an attack roll against one of the targets, you can forgo the advantage for that roll to make an additional weapon attack against that target, as part of the same action. You can do so no more than un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Força before Death
entries: Començant a nivell 18, your fighting spirit can delay the grasp of death. If you take damage that reduces you to 0 punts de vida and doesn't kill you outright, pots, com a reacció, delay falling {@condition unconscious}, and you can immediately take an extra turn, interrupting the current turn. While you have 0 punts de vida during that extra turn, taking damage causes salvada de mort failures as normal, and three salvada de mort failures can still kill you. When the extra turn ends, you fall {@condition unconscious} if you still have 0 punts de vida.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Field
entries: When you or another creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu takes damage, pots, com a reacció, expend one Dau d'Energia Psiònica, roll the die, and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (reducció mínima d'1), as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Strike
entries: You can propel your weapons with psionic force. Un cop a cada torn teu, immediately after you hit a target a 30 peus de tu with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon, you can expend one Dau d'Energia Psiònica, rolling it and dealing force damage to the target equal to the number rolled plus el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Movement
entries: You can move an object or a creature with your mind. Com a acció, you target one loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature, (excepte tu). If que puguis veure the target and it is a 30 peus de tu, you can move it fins a 30 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure. Alternatively, if it is a Tiny object, you can move it to or from your hand. Either way, you can move the target horizontally, vertically, or both. Once you take this action, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, unless you expend a Dau d'Energia Psiònica to take it again.

subclassFeature.name: Psi-Powered Leap.
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can propel your body with your mind. You gain a flying speed equal to twice your walking speed fins el final del torn actual. Once you take this bonus action, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, unless you expend a Dau d'Energia Psiònica to take it again.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Thrust.
entries: When you deal damage to a target with your Psionic Strike, you can force the target to make a Força saving throw (la CD és 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. If the save fails, you can knock the target {@condition prone} or move it fins a 10 peus en qualsevol direcció horizontally.
